Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Argyle
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Argyle due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Argyle due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
